{"id":888744543,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1675170222,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/888744543/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    \n    int[] map = new int[26];\n\n    public int lengthOfLongestSubstring(String s) {\n        int ans = 0, prev = 0;\n        resetMap();\n\n        for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++){\n            if(map[s.charAt(i)-97] != -1){\n\n                ans = Math.max(ans, i-prev);\n\n                int tmp = map[ s.charAt(i)-97 ] + 1;\n                prev = tmp;\n                \n                resetMap();\n                while(tmp <= i){\n                    map[ s.charAt(tmp)-97 ] = tmp;\n                    tmp++;\n                }\n            }\n            else{\n                map[ s.charAt(i)-97 ] = i;            \n            }\n        }\n\n        return ans;\n    }\n\n    private void resetMap(){\n        for(int i=0;i<26;i++) map[i] = -1;\n    }\n\n}\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false}
